content: Should CSLib have a copy of mathlib4's computability code? I don't believe it's used elsewhere in mathlib4.

I think we should wait until the repo is public and it's clear that this is actually useful for them. (This would involve a change of ownership of the code and I'm not yet ready to approve that given the nascent state of the library and unclear contribution model.)
Tristan Figueroa-Reid has marked this topic as resolved.
